mapper.select: select r.*, a.auction_title, u.user_nickname as reviewer_nickname from review r inner join deal d on r.deal_no = d.deal_no inner join auction a on d.auction_no = a.auction_no inner join user u on u.user_email = r.review_sender where r.review_receiver = #{userEmail};

select u.*, count(d.user_email_seller) over(partition by d.user_email_seller) as sell_cnt from user u left join deal d on u.user_email = d.user_email_seller and d.deal_condition = 2 where user_email = #{userEmail};
